name: CBSi @ E3
description:
Made in 8 days for the Giant ROM 3 game jam!

If you get an error when launching the game related to VCRedist or something similar, you need to install the Microsoft C++ 2015 runtime:

https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.a...

Gamepads are supported.

Keyboard:

Z - Confirm/Action

X - Back

Arrows - Navigation
